results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) (n >= 2, 0 <= k <= n) = number of over-all crude totals of unbranched k-5-catapolyheptagons.
reference: B. N. Cyvin et al., Isomer enumeration of unbranched catacondensed polygonal systems with pentagons and heptagons, Match, No. 34 (Oct 1996), pp. 109-121. See Table 1.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
